description: Fast check if IP exists or not in the IKnowWhatYouDownload database
name: Check IP existence

exists.description: does IKnowWhatYouDownload have history for this ip or not

date.description: last seen date in UTC, optional

outputs.known: the IP address is known to IKnowWhatYouDownload
outputs.unknown: the IP address is unknown to IKnowWhatYouDownload
